pkgmetadata.longdescription: Harrell Miscellaneous // Contains many functions useful for data analysis, high-level graphics, utility operations, functions for computing sample size and power, simulation, importing and annotating datasets, imputing missing values, advanced table making, variable clustering, character string manipulation, conversion of R objects to LaTeX and html code, recoding variables, caching, simplified parallel computing, general moving window statistical estimation, and assistance in interpreting principal component analysis.
